EN

XRP has experienced a dramatic price recovery, surging 37% in less than 18 hours after recently plummeting to $1.11. The rebound has pushed the token's price back to around $1.50, allowing it to surpass BNB and reclaim its position as the fourth-largest cryptocurrency by market cap. According to on-chain data from Santiment, this massive pump is driven by increased network stability and a significant accumulation spree by large investors. Data indicates nearly 1,400 whale transactions exceeding $100,000 occurred, the highest volume seen in four months.

Key Points

  • XRP surged by 37% in under 18 hours, recovering from a local low of $1.11 to trade near $1.50.
  • The rally allowed XRP to surpass BNB in market cap, becoming the 4th largest crypto asset.
  • Santiment attributes the price pump to network stability and massive whale accumulation.

Article

Ripple's token has also surpassed BNB in terms of market cap after its sublime surge. It was just hours ago, less than a day, when we wrote about XRP‚Äôs spectacular collapse as the asset plummeted to $1.11 for the first time since before the US presidential elections at the end of 2024. This meant that it had shed over 50% of its value in a month as it peaked at $2.40 on January 6. Oh, how the landscape in crypto can change in hours sometimes, not even days or weeks. What happened with XRP‚Äôs price since that local low has been nothing short of amazing. There were some signs about a potential rebound, such as the plummeting RSI metric, but even the most vocal XRP bulls were probably surprised by the extent of the rally. After all, the cross-border token skyrocketed by 37% in about 18 hours ‚Äì going from the aforementioned low to $1.54 before it faced some resistance and now trades around $1.50. This still represents a 34% surge in less than a day. Santiment also weighed in on the token‚Äôs performance. The analysts acknowledged XRP‚Äôs rise in terms of market cap as well, as it now sits above BNB as the fourth-largest crypto asset. They blamed the massive price pump in the past several hours on the overall network stability and growing activity on the XRP Ledger. Moreover, they showcased a chart indicating that Ripple whales went on an accumulation spree, with almost 1,400 separate $100K+ whale transactions (the highest in four months). üìà Crypto markets are rebounding, but $XRP ‚Äòs price has been on a particularly huge tear. Since bottoming out below $1.15 just under 18 hours ago, the #4 market cap has now recovered to back above $1.50. üò± Panic sellers should have stopped to notice the massive activity on the‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/3y0eyGxpo2 ‚Äî Santiment (@santimentfeed) February 6, 2026 You may also like: XRP Open Interest Hits Lowest Since November 2024: What This Means for Traders XRP ETFs Beat BTC, ETH, and SOL Funds ‚Äì Yet Ripple‚Äôs Price Still Struggles What Happened to the XRP ETFs Last Week as Ripple‚Äôs Price Tumbled to $1.70? The ETF behavior will also be interesting to compare, but we would need to verify the data at the end of the trading day in the US. Preliminary data on SoSoValue shows a minor net inflow even for yesterday, but there‚Äôs no official confirmation as of yet, which is rather surprising.
